Kinetic_Shield.help: Legendary Foes are resistant to everything.
Kinetic_Shield.targetHelp: Legendary Foes are resistant to everything.
Kinetic_Shield.attackerHit: Legendary Foes are resistant to everything.

Energy_Drain.help: Energy Drain leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance and Defense. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance or Defense. Recharge: Long
Energy_Drain.targetHelp: Your Recovery and Regeneration rates have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: {PowerName} steals some Endurance from {PlayerDest}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} steals some of your Endurance with a {PowerName}.
Your {PowerName} increases your defense!
Your {PowerName} increases your defense!
Your {PowerName} increases your Endurance!

Energy_Transfer.help: Mastery of Energy Melee begins with the ability to transfer your own pain into a punch that deals extreme smashing and energy damage while healing yourself. Energy Transfer has a good chance of Disorienting the target. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Energy_Transfer.targetHelp: Your ability to taunt has been increased. You may also have been Disoriented.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} drains some life from yourself to deal an extra {Damage} points of irresistible energy damage to {PlayerDest}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} lowers your max HP by {Damage} points!

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Power_Push.help: Power Push deals a high amount of Energy and Smashing damage and sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Power_Push.shortHelp: Ranged High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback

Nova_Stomp.help: Your stomp detonates a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova Stomp deals extreme Energy and Smashing damage to all nearby foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova_Stomp.shortHelp: Targetted AoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback
